## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G05580](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G05580)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AUN1, TOPP9</u>
- **Gene Name:** ATUNIS1, type one protein phosphatase 9
- **Description:**   Calcineurin-like metallo-phosphoesterase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2078087
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [aun1-1 aun2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Drastic reduction in pollen germination, only 10-20% of wt. Shorter root hairs.
